Subject: FYI: bunch of Anecdote checkins
Date: Mon, 24 Mar 2003 18:59:59 -0800
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2800.1106
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1106
From: "Gordon Mohr" <gojomo@...>
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

Major additions and changes:
- Moved "pumping" activity into URIChoosing stage, so it can 
  better react to depletion of URIs to consider
- Converted most System.out/System.err printlns to use Logging
- SeedPlusFrontier (as a a URIChoosing stage) starts with seeds, but 
  takes new URIs too
- SimplePoliteness (as a Preprocessing stage) offers rudimentary 
  support for robots.txt, IP-lookup
- DNSLookup is now a detour stage from Preprocessing, rather than
  in the main line
- SimpleStagedHTTP uses libhttp from Oceanstore for detour 
  http-fetching 
- SimpleAnalyzer (as a Postprocessing stage) processes robots.txt 
  and URIs in response headers
- SimpleURIStore (as a URIStoring stage) fans out new URIs into
  new CrawlURI instances, forwards as appropriate back to URIChoosing

Still does not yet extract content links, throttle traffic to 
individual servers, or detect duplicate/already-visited URIs.

- Gordon
